Headline: # 9 Ashland Temporary Reroute near Ashland/52nd
ShortDescription: 9 Ashland buses temp. rerouted NB via Ashland, 55th, Racine, 51st & Ashland; SB via Ashland, 51st, Damen, 55th due to police activity near Ashland/52nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity near Ashland/52nd.

  • Northbound buses will operate via Ashland, 55th, Racine, 51st, then resume their normal route on Ashland.
  • Southbound buses will operate via Ashland, 51st, Damen, 55th, then resume their normal route on Ashland.

Allow extra travel time.
